translation: Now begins the description of Rudra Incarnation:
Let Sri Bhagauti Ji (The Primal Lord) be helpful.

gurmukhi: ਸਭ ਹੀ ਜਨ ਧਰਮ ਕੇ ਕਰਮ ਲਗੇ ॥ ਤਜ ਜੋਗ ਕੀ ਰੀਤ ਕੀ ਪ੍ਰੀਤ ਭਗੇ ॥
transliteration: Sabh Hijan Dharam Ke Karam Lage|| Taj Jog Kireet Kipreet Bhage||
translation: All the people absorbed themselves in the works of Dharma, but the time came when the discipline of Yoga and Bhakti (devotion) was abandoned;

gurmukhi: ਜਬ ਧਰਮ ਚਲੇ ਤਬ ਜੀੳੁ ਬਢੇ ॥ ਜਨ ਕੋਟ ਸਰੂਪ ਕੇ ਬ੍ਹਮੁ ਗਢੇ ॥੧॥
transliteration: Jab Dharam Chale Teb Jeeo Badhe|| Jan Kot Saroop Ke Brahm(u) Gadhe||1||
translation: When the path of Dharma is adopted, all the souls get pleased and practising equality, they visualize One Brahman within all.1.

gurmukhi: ਜਗਜੀਵਨ ਭਾਰ ਭਰੀ ਧਰਣੀ ॥ ਦੁਖ ਅਾਕਲ ਜਾਤ ਨਹੀ ਬਰਣੀ ॥
transliteration: Jagjeevan Bhaar Bharidharanee|| Doukh Aakal Jaat Nahibaranee||
translation: This earth was pressed under the lord of sufferings of the people of the world and it was impossible to describe its anguish and agony;

gurmukhi: ਧਰ ਰੂਪ ਗੳੂ ਦਧ ਸਿੰਧ ਗੲੀ ॥ ਜਗਨਾੲਿਕ ਪੈ ਦੁਖੁ ਰੋਤ ਭੲੀ ॥੨॥
transliteration: Dhar Roop Gado Dadh Sindh Gade|| Jagnaaik Pai Doukh(u) Rot Bhaee||2||
translation: Then the earth transformed itself into a cow and weeping bitterly, she reached the milk-ocean before the Non-temporal Lord.2.

gurmukhi: ਹੱਸ ਕਾਲ ਪ੍ਰਸੰਨਿ ਭੲੇ ਤਬ ਹੀ ॥ ਦੁਖ ਸ੍ਰੳੁਨਨ ਭੂਮ ਸੁਨਯੋ ਜਬ ਹੀ ॥
transliteration: Hass Kaal Prasann(i) Bhae Tah Hee|| Doukh Sraounan Bhoom Sounyo Jab Hee||
translation: When the Lord heard with His own ears the sufferings of the earth, then the Destroyer Lord was pleased and laughed;

gurmukhi: ਢਿਗ ਬਿਸਨ ਬੁਲਾੲਿ ਲਯੋ ਅਪਨੋ ॥ ੲਿਹ ਭਾਤ ਕਹਯੋ ਤਿਹੱਕੇ ਸੁ ਪਨੇ ॥੩॥
transliteration: Dhig Bisan Bulaae Layo Apne|| Eh Bhaat Kahyo Tihakke Su Pane||3||
translation: He called Vishnu in His presence and said to him in this way.3.

gurmukhi: ਸੁ ਕਹਯੋ ਤੁਮ ਰੁਦ੍ਰ ਸਰੂਪ ਧਰੋ ॥ ਜਗਜੀਵਨ ਕੋ ਚਲਿ ਨਾਸ ਕਰੋ ॥
transliteration: Su Kahyo Toum Rudra Saroop Daro|| Jagjeevan Ko Chal(i) Jaasdaro||
translation: The destroyer Lord asked Vishnu to manifest himself as Rudra in order to destroy the beings of the world;
